name: StowersInstituteEvents
0:
”Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening”
”Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening this week”
”Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening this month”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simmer events
des:
This skill provides a listing of events hosted by the Stowers Institute for Medical Research (SIMR), which are also available on the Stowers website.
It will list events for the week or month ahead upon request, or simply upcoming consecutive events. Invocations include:
"Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening."
"Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening this week."
"Alexa, ask Simmer Events what's happening this month."
